textAfterTable: Wetmall Customer Care - 888-309-7446   DESCRIPTION: The New Hardcore Water Sports Adult Life Jacket is the most versatile life jacket available on the market today. This Life Vest can be used for a wide range of activities from Waterskiing to Boating and Tubing, plus they are adjustable enough to fit the majority of adults and teens (90 lbs+).  The Hardcore Water Sports universal vest is an adjustable life jacket that adjusts to fit a small, medium, large or extra large adult size (32" - 50" Chest Size).  This is the vest you will receive if you order a small, medium, large or extra large size. Designed to fit any person over 90lbs. Adjustable: 32" - 50"
